page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date relative generate second method

argument.name: second
argument.description: The delta in seconds between two dates.

return.name: second
return.description: The correctly formatted representation of the delta in seconds.

page.description: Method used to generate how seconds should be representation in a relative date. For example turning "1" into "1 second", and "3" into "3 seconds". See *[link:Date.toRelative]*.
